title: How many times does the Hebrew word 'הֵילֵל' (heilel) occur in the Masoretic text? - Quora

response.answer_text: If what you mean is the Noun ones, then הֵילֵל only occurs 1x in the whole תנ״ך Tanakh, in Yeshayahu 14:12. And I use BHS as the source text for the MT as depicted in the Leningrad Codex. שלום
